name: PlanB
description:
YOU CAN PLAY IT IN YOUR BROWSER HERE:
http://mdevecch.com/files/Projects/PlanB/

Plan B is the game we made in 48 hours for Game Maker's Toolkit 2018 Game Jam where the theme was "genre without mechanic". We used Construct 3 to make the game and royalty free sound/music assets.

Credits:

Simon Côté-Duchesne, programming
Maxime De Vecchi, programming
Janick Fortin, programming and drawing
Christian Lavoie, programming and VFX


This is a twin-stick shooter where you CAN'T shoot. You and another player control a space organism under attack. The objective is to be the last one alive. You need at least a controller to play. The game is meant to be played with two players (and, thus, two controllers), but you can play alone.

Features:

- Shield that reflects projectiles and change them to your color.
- Shield will be down for a few seconds after reflecting three projectiles.
- Black hole that attract the player if he isn't moving.

Powerups to help you:
- Heal gives the player + 1 hit point.
- Force field sets off a a big wave destroying all projectiles that it touches.
- Ice that freeze your opponent in place.
